Smart contracts makes it possible to program the store of value within a blockchain and automate procedures. Most 18+ webcam sites use an on-site wallet mechanism which allows members to buy tokens or credits and enjoy tip shows or private shows usually pay by sending tips or pay-per-minute mechanism.  Members can buy tokens or credits by credit/debit card, bank wires or ebanking. In general payment providers charge between the 10 and 15 percent over every transaction. Some 18+ webcam sites offer additional financial incentives if a new member was referred by a webcam model or studio.  Webcam models or studios always receive their earnings by bank transfers or special issued debit cards. With the Jizzcoins JCN as a multi-purpose 18+ token we aim to innovate this part of the business model and integrate it as first in our own 18+ ecosystem before we offer this to our partners and other companies.  Within our 18+ ecosystem we will be using on-site tokens and JCN tokens. Each user group will get his/her own ERC-20 wallet and will have features to exchange their tokens.  JCN Tokens Minimum to zero transaction fees applied for members who buy tokens/credits (compared with the conventional 10–15% transaction fees) Higher revenue share % for studios and webcam models (60–80%) 20% member referral revenue share (on-site spendings) 30% CPA offer revenue share (if their referred members will join our CPA offers) Studios and webcam models will have instant access to their earnings and can apply for a personalized crypto debit card that’s connected to their ERC-20 wallet  On-site tokens Members will always be able to purchase their on-site tokens using fiat payment methods. This also applies for webcam models and studios who prefer to be paid per bank transfer.  Broadcasting platform For studios and models we have a fully operational broadcasting platform running on www.camctrl.com  This high-performance broadcasting platform is based on the latest technology HTML5 live video streaming (WebRTC) and offers studios and models all the features to monetize their live broadcastings and publishing photo and video content. Author: SZNY
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 📹JCN Token👁️ Multi-purpose 18+ token JCNXXX
Body: The 18+ online entertainment industry During our ICO period we will publish a series of stories to give you a better understanding of the online 18+ entertainment industry, what we try to accomplish with Jizzcoins and how we will intend to grow the JCN token value.  In today’s story, we will give you an insight into the dynamic 18+ online industry.  If you have any questions and/or comments feel free to post your questions here or contact us over email ico@jizzcoins.com  Compared to traditional media the Internet provides fast, easy-to-use and anonymous access to desired pornographic content in every kind of niche on your computer, tablet or mobile phone.  For example the live 18+ webcam industry generates approximately 2-3 billion USD dollars profits worldwide and is expected to grow to 20 billion USD by 2020.  This results in huge numbers of users who are visiting daily 18+ sites to find what they are looking for.  In the past the 18+ online industry was the biggest innovator, but at the moment it’s just adapting innovations from the mainstream Internet industry.  Here in this educational post we will try to explain how the 18+ online entertainment industry is structured. You will get a good insight in the types of sites and their business models.  Video subscription sites These are subscription sites where members are required to register and pay a daily, monthly or annual subscription fee to get unlimited access to library of high quality photo and video content.  These subscription sites update their content libraries daily, multiple times per week or weekly with new episodes to retain and grow their customer base.  Members are mostly re-billed per month, quarter or year on their credit card.  Subscription sites in general get their traffic by uploading trailer video clips on porn tube sites, promotion through an affiliate program and/or having active advertising campaigns on advertising networks.  Video subscription sites work with production companies or do it all in house, where they continuously produce new photo and video content for different media channels.   Affiliate programs Most of the online 18+ product sites are promoted through an affiliate program where affiliates are compensated for each new lead or sale their referred members generate. PPL (pay-per-lead) PPS (pay-per-signup, mostly a new paying member) Revenue share (% from what a referred member spends on-site) Combo (combination of PPL/PPS with revenue share)  Affiliates will have access to in-depth statistics, banners in various dimensions, free downloadable content and video clips (trailers) to be able to promote sites on their online digital assets to monetize their valuable traffic.  Porn tube sites The porn tube model changed the online 18+ online entertainment landscape and had a big impact, forcing online 18+ companies to adapt or die. Why should consumers pay for porn when if it’s offered on porn tube sites for free.  Porn tube sites offer their members the ability to upload pirated video clips on their sites without any moderation.  Nowadays there is moderation and online 18+ companies are able to upload their trailer video content themselves on their own channel pages published on porn tube sites.  By uploading their content on porn tube sites they eventually generate traffic to their own product sites.  Porn tube sites make money by publishing advertising (banners, text links, popups) and promoting content/channels on their site as an affiliate.  However with the current Adblock features and visitors refusing to see online advertising, most of the porn tube sites experience a decrease in advertising revenues.  Live cam sites Live cam sites gain popularity fast mostly because it’s all real-time content and it’s available to access from a computer, tablet or mobile phone.  Visitors and consumers are able to interact live with girls, guys and couples from all over the world to enjoy their naughty live performances.  There are two common business models for live cam sites: premium and freemium  PREMIUM On Premium live cam sites members can register for free and interact through video chat with the online models. Private video chat sessions are pay-per-minute, so the member is being charged for each minute he or she is connected with the model’s chat room.  FREEMIUM Freemium live cam sites are gaining popularity by offering their models a “tip and tip goal” feature. Each time the model receives a tip from one of her members she will do the related action in her public chat room.  This results in a lot of action and entertainment value for the connected members who are all engaged and encouraged to send more tips to the performer.  Models broadcasting on freemium live cam sites, in general use interactive tele-dildonic devices (toys used by models that start to vibrate once a tip has been received) to offer their fans and members entertainment value.  Dating sites Dating sites are extremely popular and offer their members features to match and connect with others. Members usually pay a monthly fee to get listed and to use matching services based on their provided criteria.  Advertising platforms An advertising platform is an advanced marketplace for publishers and advertisers who are looking to monetize their traffic assets or are looking for new traffic sources to feed their online properties.  Advertisers can start CPM (cost per thousand impressions) or CPC (cost per click) campaigns and target and segment their campaigns on GEOs (countries, regions and/or languages), browser types, devices (mobile, tablet and/or desktop).  Publishers can monetize their banner spots on their online assets which are offered to advertisers within the marketplace.  CPA Platforms What exactly is a Cost-Per-Action Network? Basically a CPA network is a network that focuses mainly on Cost-Per-Action or Cost-Per-Acquisition advertising.  It’s a type of Affiliate Marketing, that often focuses on leads over sales, but not exclusively. It’s a little complex, but it's a great way to generate a lot of leads or sales really fast.

To purchase on-site tokens, members and advertisers can select from various payment methods, which are all processed through our centralized billing engine.  www.billingctrl.com  Internal management platform All our product sites and subsystems are operated and managed through our centralized multi-user administration platform. Author: SZNY
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 📹JCN Token👁️ Multi-purpose 18+ token JCNXXX
Body: How we intend to grow the JCN Token value? During our ICO period we will publish a series of stories to give you a better understanding of the online 18+ entertainment industry, what we try to accomplish with Jizzcoins and how we will intend to grow the JCN token value.  In today’s story we will try to explain to future ICO participants how we intend to grow the JCN Token value and expect to maximize our participant’s ROI based on solid facts.  During the Jizzcoins (JCN) ICO the initial fixed JCN token fee has been set at 0.001 ETH.  We expect the token value will rapidly increase once blockchain has been fully integrated in our ecosystem using smart contracts.  If you have any questions and/or comments feel free to post your questions here or contact us by email ico@jizzcoins.com  Check out our video https://vimeo.com/253289616  Full operational 18+ ecosystem Jizzcoins (JCN) will be integrated in a fully operational 18+ ecosystem consisting of unique live 18+ entertainment sites, broadcasting platform and a partner program serving a number of user groups.  Unlike other ICOs we don’t have a prototype but a fully operational 18+ ecosystem that is ready to be powered by blockchain technology.  Provide high quality live 18+ entertainment One of our main points of interests is to provide high quality live (freemium) 18+ entertainment distributed on our 18+ entertainment sites and through partner API integrations.  By targeting an undeveloped live niche (voyeur) we will be able to work with other 18+ industry players and capture a number #1 market position in this specific niche market.  Connecting new voyeur locations By opening, connecting managed and remote voyeur locations (worldwide) on our voyeur live broadcasting platform we want to bring enough live broadcasted content to our customers, which provides them with high quality live 18+ entertainment.  Our strategy is to connect a wide range of voyeur locations till 2020, each with its own residents, entertainment niche (straight, gay, lesbian, milf, etcetera), floor maps, spy voyeur cams, photo/video content and scheduled shows.  New entertainment sites, apps (dapps) and features Till 2020 we will develop and launch extra unique entertainment sites, mobile apps and dapps (decentralized apps) and new features in which blockchain will be fully integrated.  These new sites, mobile apps, dapps, and features will accelerate the monetization of our content and will contribute to an increase of JCN token transactions.  For more information please visit our roadmap: https://ico.jizzcoins.com/#roadmap  JCN Token Exchange The JCN Token Exchange will have a significant role in our ecosystem.  The exchange will provide buy, sell, earn, use and mint features for all the user groups in our ecosystem: consumers, studios, models, pornstars, voyeur residents, affiliates, advertisers and content partners.  At this moment all our sites and related systems are based on an on-site token/ewallet mechanism where the token is pegged to fiat currency (for example 10 tokens equals €1).  This on-site token mechanism will be completely replaced by a private blockchain and connected onto the public JCN Tokens.  The JCN Token Exchange will be the bridging point between the on-site tokens and JCN tokens.  Partnerships Jizzcoins (JCN) main objective is to establish strategic partnerships with partners to bring added value to both sides and increase the usage and acceptance of the JCN token.  Think of the following types of partnerships:  Voyeur API integration partners JCN token merchant API integration partners Content partners to monetize recorded video content Partners in the field of hardware, software, lingerie, toys and others  Blockchain technology (smart contracts) makes it possible to collaborate with future partners.  Think of practical examples where our voyeur live content is integrated through a sophisticated API into external online assets or merchant API integrations so other partners can accept JCN token payments.  Increase transaction volume The JCN token value will grow in value once the number of JCN token purchase transactions increases.  We expect that multiple partner integrations and connected voyeur locations eventually will contribute in an increase of transactions.  In this scenario, consumers are able to purchase JCN tokens and spend them on our online models, voyeur spy cams, content and other live entertainment features.  User groups like models, studios, affiliates and content partners who are able to earn JCN tokens will get in the near future ways to use or exchange their JCN tokens.

Author: SZNY
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 📹JCN Token👁️ Multi-purpose 18+ token JCNXXX
Body: In today’s story we will explain the difference between JCN tokens and on-site tokens used within our fully operational 18+ ecosystem.  If you have any questions and/or comments feel free to post your questions here or contact us over email ico@jizzcoins.com  On-site tokens All our sites and systems are currently using an on-site token/ewallet mechanism where consumers are billed using the following methods:  Pay per second (private shows) Unlock premium features Unlocking assets (photo albums and video clips) Pay per switch (accessing voyeur spy cams) Gamification Minting  At this moment consumers can purchase their token packages through a series of payment methods. For example credit card and various online bank transfer methods.  For the on-site tokens mechanism, we use a fixed value, where 10 tokens equal € 1  The current on-site token/ewallet mechanism is custom made and runs in a centralized setup. In time we will replace this all with a private blockchain implementation.  JCN tokens For the Jizzcoins (ICO) we have registered a total supply of 100,000,000 JCN tokens where 45,000,000 JCN are available for the public to purchase during the ICO (till April 10, 2018).  The remaining 55,000,000 JCN tokens are allocated as follows:  20,000,000 JCN tokens are held in reserve for content and gamification 5,000,000 JCN tokens for advisors and the bounty program 30,000,000 JCN tokens reserved for the managing founders  All unsold and unrewarded JCN tokens will return in our reserve on the ICO completion date. No more JCN tokens are to be issued, other than distributed during ICO.  After the ICO Jizzcoins (JCN) will be enlisted on crypto exchanges where the public can trade in this new token.  The relation between on-site and JCN tokens Both the on-site and JCN tokens are utility tokens used inside (and later outside) our 18+ ecosystem.  The prices (on-site tokens) used within our 18+ ecosystem are always fixed (e.g. private show is 25 tokens which equals €2.5 per minute) where JCN tokens will be subjected to market price fluctuations once they are listed and available on crypto exchanges.  Within our 18+ ecosystem we will create features for our user groups to exchange JCN tokens into on-site tokens and visa versa.  Later we will create a dedicated JCN token exchange accessible for all our user groups.  About Jizzcoins (JCN) Jizzcoins (JCN) is a multi-purpose 18+ token for an ecosystem of digital online adult entertainment services.  With the JCN token everyone within and outside the ecosystem automatically benefits from decentralization in a sustainable way forward.  The JCN token is based on Ethereum blockchain (ERC20 compatible) using smart contracts to automate the blockchain flow within its own live 18+ ecosystem.

Author: SZNY
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 📹JCN Token👁️ Multi-purpose 18+ token JCNXXX
Body: Live 18+ Voyeur Entertainment In today’s story we will give you an insight about live 18+ voyeur entertainment and how we are going to monetize this underdeveloped niche using blockchain technology.   What is Voyeur entertainment? Unconscious we all observe on others and let our fantasies take control of our mind. It’s embedded in our DNA to spy on other people and we can’t do anything about it.  The live 18+ voyeur entertainment niche is not new but currently underdeveloped. With The Jizzcoins (JCN) ICO we will reinvent and monetize live voyeur entertainment using blockchain technology.  Imagine multiple connected voyeur locations (houses), each with their own residents, each house equipped with a series of HD spy cameras broadcasting live video footage from real people.  Each connected voyeur location will be qualified in a niche (e.g. straight, gay, lesbian, MILF, teen, students, teens, sugar daddy, etcetera) and automatically participate in a competition.  With connected voyeur spy cam locations, you have 24/7 live video footage while a webcam model is online in average 6 hours per day.  At this moment we have one voyeur location in Brno (Czech Republic) connected on our voyeur broadcasting platform. This location has 24 HD voyeur spy cams that are live broadcasting and available on www.villavoyeur.com  Once the ICO is completed we aim to open and connected around 125 voyeur locations till 2020.  How to monetize Voyeur entertainment? We will monetize the live 18+ voyeur niche by opening and connecting worldwide houses and publish real-time 18+ live voyeur content on our own consumer entertainment sites like www.villavoyeur.com, www.vooyeur.com and through partner API integrations.  Each voyeur location has the following characteristics:  Location (Country / City) Niche 3D Floor map(s) Voyeur spy cams Residents (each resident will get its own profile page) Schedule Channel (photo albums / video clips) Score (residents and location)  Voyeur residents will be daily online in their chat rooms to interact with our online visitors and members to do private and tip shows. Registered members can unlock their photo albums and video clips.  Registered members will have access to all the voyeur spy cams where certain spy cams require a pay-per-switch fee to access.  On-site we will publish on various places advertising (CPA model) from our advertisers to provide them pay-per-lead offers.  Each voyeur location will have its own online score and is generated by a sophisticated algorithm to create an online competition between all the connected locations.  This way all the connected locations and voyeur residents all have a big chance to win monthly JCN token prizes.  Member registration is on all our sites 100% free.  Blockchain technology applied in Voyeur entertainment? All voyeur locations and voyeur residents automatically mint on-site tokens. You might think of the following minting methods:  Voyeur spy cams minting rewards (on-site tokens based on the number of spy cams and number of broadcasted minutes) Media datatype minting (on-site tokens based on published photo and video content)  Voyeur residents are able to exchange their online earnings and minted tokens into JCN tokens or fiat currency.  Future plans Once we have reached a certain number of connected voyeur locations in different countries and content niches we can port it as a TV-format and sell the television broadcasting rights per country/region.  Other points of interests which we want to embrace and combine with blockchain technology are VR (Virtual Reality), AR (Augmented Reality) and IOT (Internet Of Things).

Title: [ANN] [ICO] 📹JCN Token👁️ Multi-purpose 18+ token JCNXXX
Body: WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | TELEGRAM | REDDIT    JCN Token Multi-purpose 18+ token (ERC20)  JCN Token (JCNXXX) is an ERC20 token created by CTRL Venture for ecosystems of digital online adult entertainment services and continues where others cryptocurrencies and altcoins stop.  The JCN Token is designed for 18+ consumers, webcam models, studios, affiliates, advertisers, content partners and any other company who is active with providing products and/or services within the online adult entertainment industry.  ICO Highlights Decentralizing the online adult entertainment industry Highly profitable industry (global annual revenue size: 100 billion USD dollar market) ERC-20 (Ethereum) utility token for Consumers - JCN partners - Studios - Models Safe, secure, reliable and encrypted decentralized payment and payout solutions Assist JCN partners (B2B) to make the transition to Web 3.0 Reduce costs and increase revenues for JCN partners Consumers pay less, get more and will get access to all JCN Partner sites Fully operational 18+ ecosystem based on product sites, broadcasting platform, content, traffic and advertiser programs that's ready to be decentralized New entertainment sites, features and DAPPS Monetize the underdeveloped live voyeur spycam niche JCN Token Exchange and Marketplace (B2C - B2B) Decentralized SaaS platform for Cam Professionals (independent models and studios)  ICO details  Token name: JCN token Token symbol: JCNXXX Token standard: Ethereum blockchain (ERC20 compatible) Max quantity: 100,000,000 JCNXXX Available token supply: 45,000,000 Crowdsale smart contract: 0x6b0d72192BAFf8B978820eE72706AE02B4E72468   Token smart contract: 0x32E4561fC1FFb62393f16d5704E60BB85FDD0202 Initial fixed price: 0.001 ETH per 1 JCNXXX token Purchase JCN tokens with Bitcoin, BitcoinCash, LiteCoin, Ethereum and fiat through bank transfers ICO White Paper ICO One Pager  Private sale starts July 9th, 2018  Token sale phases  July 9 to September 15: Minimum 10 ETH with a 50% bonus September 15 to September 25: Minimum 0.75 ETH with a 25% bonus September 25 to October 5: Minimum 0.5 ETH with a 15% bonus October 5 to October 15: Minimum 0.25 ETH with a 5% bonus October 15 to November 15: Minimum 0.001 ETH with a 2% bonus  ICO Reset  Adult token JCN (JCNXXX) has reset it’s ICO, starting on July 9th with a Private sale. Till November 15th, 2018 everyone can participate in JCN including joining the JCN Partner Program.  With a renewed strategy we want to be more open towards all the user groups active within the online 18+ industry.  During Jizzcoins first ICO we wanted to bind the JCN token onto our 18+ ecosystem only, but along the way, we experienced that everyone active in the 18+ online industry can benefit from decentralization in a sustainable way forward.  The main focus for the ICO reset is to provide effective blockchain solutions towards all the user groups like customers, models, pornstars, studios, advertisers, paysite owners, content owners, advertisers, affiliates, tube, dating and cam sites and other companies active in the 18+ entertainment industry.  All user groups will be able to use the future JCN Token Exchange and associated Marketplace, where will assist companies who have joined our Partner Program to grow their business by embracing blockchain and smart contract technology.  With this renewed strategy we want to introduce a Multi-Purpose 18+ crypto token to create a worldwide acceptance and assist all our partners with all the unlimited possibilities blockchain technology has to offer.  CAM4.COM one of the world’s top webcam platforms with its huge global community of performers and fans with 2 billion visits a year has announced it will be accepting JCN.  NOTE: All previous JCN token buyers received a 100% bonus on top of their purchased JCN tokens and receive JCNXXX tokens instead. The distribution for existing JCN token holders, airdrop and bounty participants has taken place before July 11th, 2018.   Watch our ICO Video    More details on JCN.xxx

Author: SZNY
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 📹JCN Token👁️ Multi-purpose 18+ token JCNXXX
Body: Sure, I would love to explain the main purpose of Jizzcoins.  Minting and gamification will be for all user groups inside our ecosystem but it goes a bit further than that.  The online 18+ industry is one of the last in line who needs to start and adapt decentralized technologies (blockchain) and this goes further as buying/selling services or content with cryptocurrencies.  What we try to accomplish with Jizzcoins is that all our user groups benefit from integrated blockchain technology. We want to be able to work with partners (API level) where we can integrate our live content and settle with JCN (Jizzcoins) payments.  You can think of zero transaction fees applied and instant available for members buying tokens or webcam models, studios, affiliates and integration partners checking out to be paid.  Minting will be integrated everywhere in our ecosystem. We will reward our user groups with tokens who add content, reach a certain score/level and refer new members.  Our strategy is to open and connect voyeur locations and live broadcast spy cam feeds on our product sites and partner integrations.  The people who live/work in those voyeur locations earn tokens for the number of live broadcasted spy cams (in minutes), published photo/video content, referred members, earned tips, private shows and advertising offers. With online competitions the voyeur residents automatically compete in winning JCN prizes.  Through the JCN Exchange JCN.XXX all our user groups can buy, sell, earn, use and mint.  Our goal is to be one of the first companies in online adult space who has integrated blockchain technology inside and outside its ecosystem.  Feel free to ask if you have any other questions and/or remarks.

Author: SZNY
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 📹JCN Token👁️ Multi-purpose 18+ token JCNXXX
Body: Well the answer is not only patience  We have a realistic roadmap (till 2021) and want to create a token that is accepted and used by all our user groups and future partners. We believe that a longer ICO run will contribute in reaching all our goals.

Author: SZNY
Title: [ANN] [ICO] 📹JCN Token👁️ Multi-purpose 18+ token JCNXXX
Body: Good question, livestars is definitely a potential ICO.  The difference is that we focus to connect and open voyeur locations (in different niches) on our platform. This way consumers have access to an online model base, exclusive photo/video content and a big number of spy cam feeds.  Most webcam performers are online a couple of hours per day while spy cam are 24/7 accessible.  We use a freemium business model mixed with gamification, targeted CPA offer advertising features with extra earning potential for webcam performers, studios and affiliates.  The main difference is that we focus to create a serie of consumer product sites and partner integration were we will monetize our live content (models + spy cam feeds).  For a live demo please visit VillaVoyeur.com
